snippet: The couple are married in Boston.
lead_paragraph: Alvaro Emilio Amador and Michael David Widmer were married Saturday at Trinity Episcopal Church in Boston. The Rev. Patrick Carroll Ward, an associate rector at the church, performed the ceremony. Mr. Amador, 32, is a wine salesman and teaches classes on wines at the Brix Wine Shop in Boston. He received a certificate from the Elizabeth Bishop Wine Resource Center at Boston University's Metropolitan College. He is a son of Gioconda Murillo-Ruiz of Tampa, Fla., and Edgar S. Amador Mayorga of Matagalpa, Nicaragua.
